name: WyFy
description:
WyFy is an endless runner where you can stop the obstacles from moving by turning off the wifi with the wifi icon in the bottom right (or the space bar). However, if you keep the wifi off too long, you will also lose. You can see how long you have left by the green bar at the bottom. W to jump.

This is a quick little game I made in a day or so, I hope you enjoy it for what it's worth!
